name: Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc.
description: Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc. is a real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on acquiring, developing, and managing high-quality office properties and media and entertainment facilities in the West Coast markets of the United States. Founded in 2006 and headquartered in Los Angeles, California, Hudson Pacific has established a robust portfolio that caters to the needs of innovative companies across various sectors, including technology, media, and entertainment. The company emphasizes sustainable development and operational excellence, often incorporating modern amenities and green building practices to enhance the workplace environment. Hudson Pacific's strategic locations in urban centers like San Francisco, Seattle, and Los Angeles allow it to attract a diverse range of tenants. The company also engages in partnerships with leading firms to create innovative spaces that foster creativity and collaboration. With a commitment to responsible real estate investment and community engagement, Hudson Pacific continues to grow its footprint while delivering value to its shareholders.

seo.meta_title: Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc. | Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc., a leading REIT focused on high-quality office and media properties in the West Coast. Discover our commitment to sustainable development and innovation.

faq.question: What does Hudson Pacific Properties focus on?
faq.answer: Hudson Pacific Properties focuses on acquiring and managing high-quality office and media properties on the West Coast.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Hudson Pacific Properties?
faq.answer: Victor Coleman is the CEO of Hudson Pacific Properties, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Hudson Pacific Properties headquartered?
faq.answer: Hudson Pacific Properties is headquartered in Los Angeles, California, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Hudson Pacific own?
faq.answer: Hudson Pacific primarily owns office properties and media and entertainment facilities.

faq.question: When was Hudson Pacific Properties founded?
faq.answer: Hudson Pacific Properties was founded in 2006.
